name: ALKIMEDIA
description: ALKIMEDIA is a web agency operating in Milan, specializing in professional and quality website design, SEO, and web marketing. They help clients with new website projects and improving online presence.
services: Consulting and training for website management

contact.address: Near Lecco, serving Milan and all Lombardy

unique_selling_points: Focus on natural SEO positioning from the start of the project
High-quality work at a fair price
Training clients to manage and update their websites
Specialized in WordPress websites with modular assistance packages

additional_info.content_creation: Professional content creation including short texts and corporate videos
additional_info.hosting: Professional hosting services to ensure fast and reliable website performance
additional_info.web_marketing: Consulting services to improve online visibility and business credibility
